summary: A comedy about a young lawyer of a prestigious firm but with a catastrophic private life.
cast: Fabio Volo|Zoé Félix|Ennio Fantastichini|Nicola Nocella|Simone Nepote André|Federico Baccomo|Isa Barzizza|Erika Blanc|Luisella Boni|Cyrille Toualy Bonin|Adriano Braidotti|Carlo Cancemi|Carlo Cassina|Alice Ceccarini|Marco Costantini|Arlene Cracchiolo|Annalisa De Simone|Sergio Mario De Vidovic|Maty Bineta Diouf|Jean-Michel Dupuis|Annalisa Favetti|Paolo Fosso|Fabio Gellera|Ahmed Hafiane|Sylvia Kleoniki|Eugenio Krauss|Franco Maino|Tiziana Martello|Pino Micol|Francesco Montaldi|Jay Natelle|Simone Nepote|Sophie Olsson|Stella Pecollo|Marina Rocco|Franco Spinoglio|Hossein Taheri|Paolo Tarozzi|Irene Timpanaro|Liliya Zalunina|David Matthaeus Zurbuchen|Soraia Di Fazio
title: Studio illegale
